generated.title: GeneratedMolarHeatCapacity
generated.description: This is an autogenerated partial class definition of 'MolarHeatCapacity'

description*.en: "Molar Heat Capacity" is the amount of heat energy required to raise the temperature of 1 mole of a substance. In SI units, molar heat capacity (symbol: cn) is the amount of heat in joules required to raise 1 mole of a substance 1 Kelvin.

title: MolarHeatCapacity
description: "Molar Heat Capacity" is the amount of heat energy required to raise the temperature of 1 mole of a substance. In SI units, molar heat capacity (symbol: cn) is the amount of heat in joules required to raise 1 mole of a substance 1 Kelvin.
